title: Directx 9.0c for those who have had trouble installing before
description:
so basically the readme is in there, if u have had trouble installing before, if u use this, it should work, if u already have an older directx installed, be sure to use the uninstaller first. and remember thats in safe mode only. it also requires your xp cd so be sure to have that handy!!

torrent is completely legal i might add, as it came from software u can currently find on the web for free, (microsoft.com being an example)
